block.p: Maria Elena Celis, the daughter of Dr. Ellen Celis and Dr. Godofredo Celis of Concord, Staten Island, was married yesterday to Vincent Jeanseaume, a son of Marcelle Jeanseaume of La Ciotat, France, and the late Gilbert Jeanseaume. The Rev. Joseph O'Meara performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of Our Lady of the Rosary in Manhattan.

The bride, 27, will continue to use her name professionally. She is an associate at Neville, Peterson & Williams, a law firm in Manhattan. She graduated from Columbia and received her law degree from Yeshiva University. Her father, a neurologist, has practices in Willowbrook, Staten Island, and Brooklyn. He is also the chief of neurology at both Kingsbrook Jewish Medical Center in Brooklyn and St. Vincent's Medical Center in West Brighton, Staten Island. Her mother is an obstetrician and gynecologist at Coney Island Hospital in Brooklyn.

Maria Elena Celis, the daughter of Dr. Ellen Celis and Dr. Godofredo Celis of Concord, Staten Island, was married yesterday to Vincent Jeanseaume, a son of Marcelle Jeanseaume of La Ciotat, France, and the late Gilbert Jeanseaume. The Rev. Joseph O'Meara performed the ceremony at the Roman Catholic Church of Our Lady of the Rosary in Manhattan.

The bride, 27, will continue to use her name professionally. She is an associate at Neville, Peterson & Williams, a law firm in Manhattan. She graduated from Columbia and received her law degree from Yeshiva University. Her father, a neurologist, has practices in Willowbrook, Staten Island, and Brooklyn. He is also the chief of neurology at both Kingsbrook Jewish Medical Center in Brooklyn and St. Vincent's Medical Center in West Brighton, Staten Island. Her mother is an obstetrician and gynecologist at Coney Island Hospital in Brooklyn.

The bridegroom, 31, is a business manager and salesman at Paris Images, an art and frames gallery in Manhattan. He graduated from the University of Marseille. His mother is an attendant at Le Cigalou, a nursing home in La Ciotat. His father was an independent builder and architect.
